Articles.Content:
This is a delta-wing type spaceplane. So far I\'ve found I can get it to a 600km orbit. Uses stock parts and some Nova parts.

There were some sloppy inconsistencies in both designs, I\'ve updated both craft files.

Pretty stable, I generally take off and climb at 40 degrees pitch. When my vertical speed reaches its peak, I activate the aerospike thruster and climb until the air breathing engines\' efficiency drops, at which point I decouple them from the wings and activate RCS control. Landing will probably be a glide down, but if you\'re careful you\'ll have fuel to correct you reentry if needed.

Pics below of the stock and Nova variants.

\*\*\*\***IMPORTANT NOTE: DO NOT ACTIVATE THE LAST STAGE. EVER!**\*\*\*\*

Since Nova is in with the devs now, you really ought to give the Nova Punch pack a try! Also, fly my plane! Highly capable, also capable of delivering small probodyne satellites into kerbin orbit. Just keep an eye on that RCS! New Pics above!
Looks good. When i will move on Nova Punch mod, i will give it a try.

I like the drop engines, although i can\'t imagine them being economical.

Think I\'m gunna give it a go.
